name: Bee Slap
description:
The Game:

An asymmetrical one keyboard two players game. One player is the bee; the other the hands.

Score as many points as the bee. Stop the bee from scoring as the hands.

No bees were actually hurt in the game and bees are our buddies since they pollinate the world.

Goal: This is the very first game I have ever created. Any tips and advice is greatly appreciated.

The goal was to mainly see if I can code in GML and make very, very simple sprites.

Aspects that I know that need to be improved:

  • Game has no sound or music
  • Bee grab input is not as precise as I would like it
  • Learn how to export to Mac ;_; without a personal Mac computer
